title: Chou Yuu Sekai: Being the Reality
synopsis: A hot-blooded high school teen, a mysterious female swordsman, and an unpredictable dark emo girl. It's impossible to distinguish between reality and the game world! What kind of conspiracy is awaiting them in this super journey of the world!
voices: ['Yamamoto, Kazutomi', 'Ikuta, Yoshiko', 'Horie, Shun', 'Kubo, Yurika', 'Adachi, Yuuki', 'Katou, Emiri', 'Yano, Masaaki', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Iida, Riho', 'Yashima, Sarara']
staff: [['Tsuji, Hatsuki', ['Director']], ['Imaizumi, Yuuichi', ['Sound Director']], ['Iida, Riho', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Miyamae, Mitsuharu', ['Art Director']]]
